channel.title: I need help editing a client already made
channel.description:
I downloaded a client and im trying to make it my own by changing something.
Here are the things im trying to change, if u could help that'd be great: 1) The server login. It's built in to login to str3ngthscap3.no-ip.biz. How do i change it to punks4life.no-ip.biz. I searched under client.class and changed it but it is still the same ip login
2) How do I change the client name? Like when it opens it says Str3ngthscap3 client. How do i change it to mine?
Thanks

item.title: I need help editing a client already made
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“Snaz, post:9, topic:304267”][quote author=kingman002 link=topic=400556.msg2970253#msg2970253 date=1253918101]

First off, go to client.java

Second off do Ctrl + F

Third off search the server ip (in your case str3ngthscap3.no-ip.biz)

Fourth off change it to the server ip wanted (in your case punks4life.no-ip.biz)

Lastly, after you get all that done save it, compile, and you’re ready to log in on that server ip.
[/quote]

Don’t know where youve been getting your incorrect facts from :)[/quote]

erm… it works for me, i don’t see how it’s wrong.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help editing a client already made

item.title: I need help editing a client already made
item.dc:creator: @pkpoison pkpoison
item.description:
@pkpoison wrote:

This is why people put an Anti-Leech.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 25, 2009, 05:32:05 pm[/size][hr][quote=“kingman002, post:7, topic:304267”][quote author=Killermax link=topic=400556.msg2970057#msg2970057 date=1253905325]

  1. The server login. It’s built in to login to str3ngthscap3.no-ip.biz. How do i change it to punks4life.no-ip.biz. I searched under client.class and changed it but it is still the same ip login

[/quote]

First off, go to client.java

Second off do Ctrl + F

Third off search the server ip (in your case str3ngthscap3.no-ip.biz)

Fourth off change it to the server ip wanted (in your case punks4life.no-ip.biz)

Lastly, after you get all that done save it, compile, and you’re ready to log in on that server ip.[/quote]

Lol, thats not right.

item.source: I need help editing a client already made

item.title: I need help editing a client already made
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

Killermax:

1) The server login. It’s built in to login to str3ngthscap3.no-ip.biz. How do i change it to punks4life.no-ip.biz. I searched under client.class and changed it but it is still the same ip login

First off, go to client.java

Second off do Ctrl + F

Third off search the server ip (in your case str3ngthscap3.no-ip.biz)

Fourth off change it to the server ip wanted (in your case punks4life.no-ip.biz)

Lastly, after you get all that done save it, compile, and you’re ready to log in on that server ip.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help editing a client already made
item.dc:creator: @I_r_Pwn_u I r Pwn u
item.description:
@I_r_Pwn_u wrote:

[quote=“Mod Franklin, post:4, topic:304267”]You change the Ip In the EGUI.java
and you change the client name in the client.java[/quote]
The ip can also be in Client.java

Read full topic
item.source: I need help editing a client already made

item.title: I need help editing a client already made
item.dc:creator: @Reisyukaku Reisyukaku
item.description:
@Reisyukaku wrote:

I always use notepad++ to edit stuff like that because of its feature that lets you search a keyword not only in the file but you can set a directory of files. So what i would do is hit ctrl + F then go to the tab that lets you search within a directory and search the ip you wanna change and change it.

Disclaimer: I am not advertising in anyway, just giving suggestions. I have to through this out there cuz of butthurt fags.

Read full topic
